Using the tutorial from the official website: https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/architecture/room?hl=fr with some extra features

Throughout football\'s colourful history, Real Madrid have been the masters. This adidas home jersey takes the d√©collage artwork plastered throughout the club\'s home city as its inspiration. The soft, moisture-absorbing fabric includes mesh cutouts that mimic the artwork\'s standout \"ripped paper\" style. Premium embroidered team details add the finishing touch. Details: Regular fit is a slightly looser cut than what players wear on the pitch Short sleeves 100% recycled polyester doubleknit Lightweight fabric with a silky feel Sweat-wicking Climalite fabric Embroidered Real Madrid crest
